name: Slash Out
description:
You brought a sword to a gun fight.

Why use a gun when you've been studying the blade your whole life? Plus it looks way cooler.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement (duh, have you not played a game before?)
  • Space - jump and double jump
  • Left click - Melee/attack

Enemies can't shoot behind themselves so use that to your advantage! Send bullets back to your enemies (if you're fast enough).

Get the highest score you can before you meet your demise!
